metadata.title: Barkley Sound Zooplankton, 1991-present
metadata.description: Tombstone (length, weight, sex, maturity, stage, species) of zooplankton collected by Ron Tanasichuk in Barkley Sound from 1991 to the present. Dataset is used to describe variations in population biology of zooplankton.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Used continuously by custodian to learn about variations in population biology and productivity of key fish prey. Objective is to evaluate effect of changes in fish prey biology on population biology and productivity of fish populations.

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Data are in electronic format, well backed up and well documented.
Risk of Loss: Low
Impact Justification: Long-term time series of broad applicability.
Impact of Loss: Medium

Status: In work

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Private

Use constraints: Data is part of one of the custodian`s key ongoing research activities.

Distribution liability: [unknown]
